The U.S. National Institutes of Health, through its National Library of Medicine and other Institutes, maintains a database of clinical trials at Clinical Trials.gov.  To see a list of current clinical trials on rheumatoid arthritis, type ""rheumatoid arthritis"" into the search box.",NIHSeniorHealth,Rheumatoid Arthritis
